1.content: Create comprehensive README.md for GitHub repository
1.details: Transform existing README.md into awesome, complete, and useful GitHub repository documentation including: (1) Application architecture section with file hierarchy diagram and key file descriptions, (2) Mermaid diagram showing user-application interaction, (3) Mermaid diagram showing application logic flow, (4) Enhanced deployment section, (5) Updated project status (7/8 phases complete with A+ SEO score), (6) GitHub-specific features (badges, shields)

2.details: Implement comprehensive testing and WCAG AAA compliance verification for the Gabriel Family Clinic website - 90-120 minute implementation
